```{r tab1, cache=cacheon}

tab1_tmp <- CreateTableOne(
  vars = tabvars,
  strata = c("sos_com_ra", "casecontrol", "shf_ef_cat2"),
  data = pdata
)
tab1 <- print(tab1_tmp,
  varLabels = TRUE, missing = TRUE, printToggle = FALSE, nonnormal = tabvars,
  test = FALSE,
  catDigits = 1, contDigits = 1,
  explain = FALSE,
  noSpaces = TRUE
)

tab1out <- as_tibble(cbind(
  var = rownames(tab1), tab1[, c(1:8)] 
),
.name_repair = "unique"
)
# tab1out <- as_tibble(cbind(rownames(tab1), tab1[, 6], tab1[, c(1:2, 5, 3)]))

tab1out <- tab1out %>%
  mutate(
    tmp_varsforfoot = var,
    var = sub("  ", ". ", var),
    var = sanitize_text(var)
  )


## add footnote about ras (arb, aceir, arni)

tab1out$var <- ifelse(stri_extract_first_words(tab1out$tmp_varsforfoot) == "shf_ras",
  paste0(tab1out$var, footnote_marker_symbol(1)), tab1out$var
)

## add footnote about disp income

tab1out$var <- ifelse(stri_extract_first_words(tab1out$tmp_varsforfoot) == "scb_dispincome_cat2",
  paste0(tab1out$var, footnote_marker_symbol(2)), tab1out$var
)

## add footnote about modvars

tab1out$var <- ifelse(stri_extract_first_words(tab1out$tmp_varsforfoot) %in% modvars1,
  paste0(tab1out$var, footnote_marker_symbol(3)), tab1out$var
)

tab1out$var <- ifelse(stri_extract_first_words(tab1out$tmp_varsforfoot) %in% modvars2,
  paste0(tab1out$var, footnote_marker_symbol(4)), tab1out$var
)

tab1out <- tab1out %>% select(-tmp_varsforfoot)

# remove NA
tab1out <- tab1out %>%
  mutate(across(everything(), str_replace_all, fixed("NA [NA, NA]"), "-")) %>%
  mutate(across(everything(), str_replace_all, fixed("0 (NaN)"), "-")) 

## white space removed in kable function.
## fix in order to use escape = TRUE
colnames(tab1out) <- sanitize_text(c(
  "Variables", rep(c("No RA", "RA"), 4))
)

write.xlsx(tab1out, paste0("./output/tabs/tab1_", Sys.Date(), ".xlsx"), rowNames = FALSE)

myHeader <- c(" " = 1, "<40%" = 4, "=>40%" = 4)
names(myHeader) <- c(" ", "<40%", "=>40%")

myHeader2 <- c(" " = 1, "Case" = 2, "Control" = 2, "Case" = 2, "Control" = 2)
names(myHeader2) <- c(" ", "Case", "Control", "Case", "Control")

footnote(
  mykable(tab1out,
    fontsize = 4,
    caption = "Baseline characteristics",
    longtable = TRUE,
    escape = FALSE
  ) %>%
    landscape() %>%
    add_header_above(myHeader2) %>%
    add_header_above(myHeader),
  general = c(
    "Categorical variables are presented with n (%) and tested with chi-square test and continuous variables with median [q1-q3] and tested with Kruskal-Wallis test AT SOME POINT.....",
    "Variables with prefix shf_ are from the SwedeHF, sos_ fom NPR." 
  ),
  symbol = c(
    "arb/acei/arni",
    "Medium within index year",
    "Variables included in Adj models age, sex, comorbs",
    "Variables included in Adj models age, sex, comorbs, socioec"
  )
)
```
